advancements.spice.spicey_sand.title: Spicy Sand
advancements.spice.spicey_sand.descripti: Find a desert, if only you could eat sand
advancements.spice.cooked_spice.title: Red, White and Brown
advancements.spice.cooked_spice.descript: The true colors of freedom, dig up some Enriched Mud and put it on the barby
advancements.spice.enriched_mud.title: Don't Drink and Minecraft
advancements.spice.enriched_mud.descript: Splash a block of Enriched Sand with water, then dig that spice
advancements.spice.iron_tools.title: Diggy Diggy Hole
advancements.spice.iron_tools.descriptio: Craft an iron shovel, the spice won't dig itself
advancements.spice.water.title: Water is Wet
advancements.spice.water.description: Get a bottle of water, no one likes it dry
